name: Strategic Social Disengagement
description: Exiting toxic social networks and environments without triggering retaliation.

cards.title: The Silent Phase-Out
cards.description: Gradually disengaging from toxic individuals without confrontation.
bulletpoints: Reducing availability and social presence over time.
Introducing plausible distractions to explain withdrawal.
Softening exit visibility by diversifying social circles.

cards.title: Covert Disengagement Tactics
cards.description: Methods to extract yourself from toxic entanglements without raising alarms.
bulletpoints: Using misinformation as a smokescreen to cover your exit.
Seeding alternative narratives to prevent emotional pursuit.
Avoiding reactionary triggers that PSNs use to regain control.

cards.title: Conflict-Free Breakaways
cards.description: Dissolving relationships with minimal backlash or social drama.
bulletpoints: Mastering neutrality to deny emotional hooks for re-engagement.
Creating irreversible conditions that prevent rekindling.
